comment.author: 60365138@N00
comment._content:
Doesn't he just?
One day I must see the JT collection. I understand it is beyond magnificient and that JT was way ahead of his time. 

Alas-  from the North Wales coast, getting to London is easier.

edit - actually, are the photos on public display in the first place?

comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: Thank you very much for all your comments. The John Thomas collection can be seen in the Digital Mirror section of the National Library of Wales's website www.llgc.org.uk/index.php?id=johnthomas You may also search our catalouge of images/photos from our website.
